thread.title: BRIEF-Perrigo Company Reports Select Preliminary Unaudited 2017 Financial Results

title: BRIEF-Perrigo Company Reports Select Preliminary Unaudited 2017 Financial Results
text: 03 AM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-Perrigo Company Reports Select Preliminary Unaudited 2017 Financial Results Reuters Staff Feb 27 (Reuters) - Perrigo Company Plc: * REPORTS SELECT PRELIMINARY UNAUDITED CALENDAR YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS * PERRIGO COMPANY - ‍WILL RESCHEDULE ITS Q4 AND FISCAL YEAR 2017 FINAL EARNINGS RELEASE AND CONFERENCE CALL, PREVIOUSLY SCHEDULED FOR FEBRUARY 27, 2018​ * PERRIGO COMPANY - ‍CO NEEDS ADDITIONAL TIME TO COMPLETE ITS FINAL INCOME TAX REVIEW PROCEDURES RELATED TO RECONCILIATIONS OF SPECIFIC NON-CASH ITEMS​ * ‍COMPANY IS WORKING TO COMPLETE ITS YEAR-END TAX REVIEW PROCEDURES​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
